android.widget.TextView.text: Keeps you informed about new features. You'll continue to receive two-factor and login notifications even if this is turned off.
Device lock must be configured to use this feature
Allow other applications to capture your screen including your one-time passcodes. Note: Please restart the application if you change this setting.
For further assistance, see the Help section in the menu.
